  • fusilli.data.downsample_img_batch
  • View page source

fusilli.data.downsample_img_batchÔÉÅ

downsample_img_batch(imgs, output_size)[source]ÔÉÅ

Downsamples a batch of images to a specified size.

Parameters:

  • imgs (array-like) ‚Äì Batch of images. Shape (batch_size, channels, height, width) or (batch_size, channels, height, width, depth) for 3D images.

  • output_size (tuple) ‚Äì Size to downsample the images to (height, width) or (height, width, depth) for 3D images. Do not put the batch_size dimension in the tuple. If None, no downsampling is performed

Returns:

downsampled_img ‚Äì Downsampled image.

Return type:

array-like
